title: WordCamp Bucharest
description:
After one one year and a half of local WordPress meetups, weâ€™re thrilled to announce WordCamp Bucharest 2016, a community event dedicated to WordPress specialists, developers and enthusiasts. Everyone from simple users to core developers are welcome to come, share their ideas and even get on the stage!

Come learn and celebrate WordPress in Bucharest on the 8th – 9th of October 2016!
